title: What is the best iMac to buy in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: 27’’ IMAC comes in three different configurations it will be the last i Macs that has intel installed it has had a massive upgrade all the Apple watchers have praised the upgrades to the 2020 I MAC 27”However APPLE is now installing there own chips called silicon over the next two years NEW I Macs will be coming soon the present I mac 21” and 27” will be out outdated to find out more in formation go to U TUBE there more than one video from Apple experts they will give you all the information necessary as to up and coming changes
the 27″no doubt. or wait for the ARM imac cause that would be interesting the rest depends on your particular use case (although i do recommend a 1tb ssd if you were to keep it for a long time)
